snippet.title: 49ers thump Steelers on Monday night
snippet.description:
49ers thump Steelers on Monday night (http://www.sportsbetting.ag/news/nfl-football/20/12/2011/49ers-thump-steelers-on-monday-night/)
1 point
by rosedevid
2 years ago
0 comment Follow
Despite Big Bens 330 yards 25/44 effort, Pittsburgh Steelers went down 3-20 defeat to 49ers on Monday night. With the defeat 49ers almost thumped Steelers to go to 11-3 season against that of 10-4 of opponents.
*[2 years ago]: 2011-12-20T12:28:55.000Z
